description:
The good news: 20 percent of all music sales take place in the last six weeks of the year - during the holiday season! And the demand is there every year.

The bad news: Most artists never tap into this holiday revenue potential. BIG MISTAKE!

Do what the smart artists do: Use the creative strategies and success stories packed into this course. Take the best ideas and create a plan to share your music, do good in the world, and profit from it. Year after year!

You'll learn:

  • How one indie artist generated $3,000 in sales from one simple idea
  • How to sell 5 to 10 copies of your CDs at a time
  • Black Friday / Cyber Monday sales strategies
  • How one band got a local micro brewery to sponsor their new Christmas single
  • An essential aspect of your holiday music album that could triple your sales
  • The overlooked holiday sales dates most marketers miss
  • How one trio sells more than 1,000 tickets to its annual holiday show
  • SEO ninja tricks to help music fans find you during the holidays

This course has three parts:

  • How to Sell More Music and Make More Money This Holiday Season
  • How to Book More Christmas Shows and Create Profitable Annual Holiday Events
  • How to Create Awareness and Spread Good Will During the Holiday Season

The lessons are delivered via 65 minutes of video, with MP3 audio files you can download and listen to at your convenience. You also get an eight-page worksheet to take notes and craft a customized holiday music marketing plan.

Bonus audio interviews with:

  • Jeffrey Paul Bobrick, who raised $6,000 with a Chanukkah song Kickstarter campaign.
  • Debbie Fortnum, a bestselling indie artist in Canada, who shares success tips for developing lucrative relationships with retailers.
  • Katey Laurel, a Denver singer who profits from Christmas shows and an ingenious multi-songwriter holiday event.

Register for this course on Udemy today and get lifetime access to the lessons. Watch them on your computer, or on your smartphone or tablet using the free Udemy app.

Plus, it comes with a 30-Day, Money-Back Guarantee!
title: Holiday Music Marketing (Christmas, Hanukkah & More)
